parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.24

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Remote Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if UAV is connectable by AV terminal(s).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[isUAVConnectable]] [uav, checkAllItems]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> uav: [[Object]] or [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> checkAllItems: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to check all terminals in unit's inventory, [[false]] to only check assigned terminal.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _canConnect = myUnit [[isUAVConnectable]] [myUav, [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableUAVConnectability]], [[disableUAVConnectability]]
</value></part></template></root>
